page.title: 20Alvechurch Football Club.
page.content: Many people have heard of Alvechurch football club. It was founded in 1929, when the team had to change in a local pub and walk over to the playing fields. In 1957 the club moved to Lye Meadow. Alvechurch joined the Midlands Combination in 1961 and won the league title the following year. In the next 8 seasons they won the championship 4 times and the League Challenge Cup 5 times. In their second year in the F.A Cup they reached the first round in 1971_72 after an 11 hour marathon against Aldershot, and this was recorded in the Guiness Book of Records. Other famous cup games have been played against Exeter City, and Bradford City.
